7.title: GREEK LETTERS
clues: Dear Pindar, good news: when this Macedonian sacked Thebes in 335 B.C., I hear he spared your house

Hey guy!  Aristophanes sure satirized you in "The Frogs"; it was much funnier than your "Medea"
Dear Aristeides, I can't believe this author paralleled your life with that Roman loser Marcus Cato

11.title: TALK LIKE A SAILOR
clues: All is well if things are on an "even" one of these
